title: Design Thinking-Based Social Innovation Project: Integrated Education Through Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Social Science Theories and Project-Based Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Students utilize design thinking tools and digital devices to solve field problems while collaborating with industry partners. Experience iterative prototyping and feedback processes in blended online-offline environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically solve real-world social problems through a project following the five stages of design thinking (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test)
Learners can creatively manage conflicts arising during peer collaboration and produce final outputs by applying the experiential learning model
Learners can quantitatively and qualitatively measure core competencies of design thinking (empathic problem definition, user-centered solution development) according to assessment rubrics
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
